T02bsu011_u:1: ye ca te bodhisattvānāṃ trayaḥ śīlaskandhā uktāḥ /
T02bsu011_u:2: saṃvara śīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca teṣu śikṣitukāmena gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmmikasya
T02bsu011_u:3: bodhisattvasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya vāg vijñaptyartha grahaṇāvabodhasamarthasya pādayornnipatyādhyeṣaṇā kāryā /
T02bsu011_u:6: tadarhasyanuparodhena muhūrttamadanukampayā dātuṃ śrotuñceti // trirevamadhyeṣya ekāṃsamuttarāṅgaṃ kṛtvādaśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ saṃsthāpya saṃpūjya puraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T02bsu011_u:7: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti /
T02bsu011_u:9: na cirasyedānī me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti
T02bsu011_u:11: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo 'vikṣiptena
T02bsu011_u:12: cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
T02bsu011_u:13: śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ
T02bsu011_u:16: pratīcchasi tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau kṛtapraṇidhāno mamāntikāt sarvvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvañca
T02bsu011_u:17: bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca yacchīlamatītānāṃ bodhisattvanāmabhūt yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
T02bsu011_u:18: yacchīlamanāgatānām bodhisattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
T02bsu011_u:19: yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bhavati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
T02bsu011_u:20: yeṣu ca śikṣāpadeṣu yeṣu śīleṣvatītāḥ sarvvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ /
T02bsu011_u:24: samanvāharantu māṃ daśadiglokadhānusannipatitā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāḥ /
T02bsu011_u:26: yatkiñcitkāyavāṅmanobhirbuddha bodhisattvān mātāpitarau tadanyān vā sattvān samāgamyehajanmanyanyeṣu vā janmāṃ tareṣu mayāpāyaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritamanumoditam vā tat sarvvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāmācāryyasya cāntike 'grayā pravarayā pratideśanayā pratideśayāmi jānan smaran na praticchādayāmi // trirevam //
T02bsu011_u:27: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya āvodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahākārūṇikaṃ sarvvajñaṃ sarvvadarśinaṃ sarvvavairabhayātītaṃ mahāpuruṣamabhedyakāyamanuttarakāyaṃ dharmmakāyaṃ
T02bsu011_u:28: śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam // so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍadiṣadanāddharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi śāntaṃ virāgāṇāṃ pravaram /
T02bsu011_u:31: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyayastriśaraṇagato 'nantasattvadhātūttāraṇāyābhyuddharaṇāya saṃsāraduḥkhāt paritrāṇāya sarvvajñajñāne anuttare pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
T02bsu011_u:32: yathā te atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā bodhicittamutpādya buddhatvamadhigatavanto 'dhigamiṣyanti
T02bsu011_u:34: yathā sarvvabuddhā 'nāvaraṇena buddhajñānena buddh cakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti yathā dharmmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāma(?) nujānanti /
T02bsu011_u:35: tena vidhinā ahamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmna ācāryyasyāntikāt sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ ca purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayāmi // trirevam //
T02bsu011_u:36: idaṃ cāhamatyayadeśanātriśaraṇagamanabodhicittotpādajanitaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi yadahaṃ loke aśaraṇe alayane aparāyaṇe 'dvipe trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ layaṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ dvīpo bhaveyam /
T02bsu011_u:42: pratigṛhya ca yathāśakti yathābalam yathājñānaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samāropayāmi /
T02bsu011_u:43: itaḥ prabhṛti yatkiñcit dānaṃ dāsyāmi śīlaṃ rakṣiṣyāmi kṣāṃti saṃpādayiṣyāmi vīryamārabhya dhyānaṃ samāpatsye prajñayā vyavacāryya upāyakauśalyaṃ vā śikṣiṣye tat sarvvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya //
T02bsu011_u:44: uttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya teṣāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikāṇāṃ mahāyāne sāmicīmanupravrajāmi /
T02bsu011_u:45: anupravrajya bodhisattvo 'haṃ bodhisattva iti māmitaḥ prabhṛtyācāryyo dhārayatu // trirevam
T02bsu011_u:46: tatastenācāryyeṇa tasyāḥ pratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornnipatya sāmicīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
T02bsu011_u:47: gṛhītamanenaivaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mamaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt yāvat trirapi bodhisatvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam
T02bsu011_u:48: sohamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtaṃ prajānan asyaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasya paramāryyāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvvasattvānāṃ viparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśadikṣvanantāparyyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvārocayāmi asmin bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam // trirevam //
T02bsu011_u:49: evaṃ punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmmasamāptyanantaraṃ dharmmatā khalveṣā yad daśasu dikṣvanantāparyyantesu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ tadrupaṃ nimittam prādurbhavati yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
T02bsu011_u:50: evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvara samādānaṃ samāttamiti // evaṃ tāvat parataḥ samādānavidhiruktaḥ //
T02bsu011_u:51: yadi tairguṇairyuktaḥ pudgalo na sannihitaḥ syāt tato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne vacanīyam /
T02bsu011_u:53: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya utkuṭukena vā idam syādvacanīyam /
T02bsu011_u:54: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
T02bsu011_u:55: teṣāṃ purataḥ sarvvāṇi bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvaṃ ca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade /
T02bsu011_u:56: yacchīlamityādi pūrvvavat yāvat bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti /
T02bsu011_u:57: māmitaḥ prabhṛti buddha bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca dhārayantviti vijñaptiḥ
